Sentencas: A binary Fe-30 wt.%Cr alloy and corresponding ternary alloys containing manganese, molybdenum or tungsten were studied with respect to sigma-phase formation at 650 degrees C.
Titulo: Sigma-phase formation in high chromium ferritic steels at 650 °C

Sentencas: Although even after 3000 h exposure complete equilibration was not attained, the presence of tungsten and especially molybdenum was found to promote sigma-phase formation.
Titulo: Sigma-phase formation in high chromium ferritic steels at 650 °C

Sentencas: More extensive sigma-phase formation was observed in the tungsten and especially in the molybdenum-containing alloys than in the binary and manganese-containing alloy.
Titulo: Sigma-phase formation in high chromium ferritic steels at 650 °C

Sentencas: Apparently the bulk free energy decrease driving the nucleation of sigma-phase is substantially larger when tungsten or molybdenum are present in the alloy.
Titulo: Sigma-phase formation in high chromium ferritic steels at 650 °C

Sentencas: The presence of a nickel layer, to simulate the contact between ferritic steel interconnects and nickel mesh in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) results in the formation of an austenitic zone and in accelerated formation of a sigma-phase rich layer at the ferrite/austenite interface, due to interdiffusion processes.
Titulo: Sigma-phase formation in high chromium ferritic steels at 650 °C

Sentencas: This interface acts as a highly efficient heterogeneity for the nucleation of sigma-phase.
Titulo: Sigma-phase formation in high chromium ferritic steels at 650 °C

Sentencas: The nucleation is enhanced by an increased Cr/Fe-ratio at that interface.
Titulo: Sigma-phase formation in high chromium ferritic steels at 650 °C

Sentencas: Several possible modes for the growth of the sigma layer were identified but the available experimental data were not sufficient to distinguish among these.
Titulo: Sigma-phase formation in high chromium ferritic steels at 650 °C

Sentencas: The sigma-rich layer, which appears to act as an interdiffusion barrier, is thicker in the case of the binary Fe-Cr and the Fe-Cr-Mn alloy than for the molybdenum- or tungsten-rich alloys.
Titulo: Sigma-phase formation in high chromium ferritic steels at 650 °C

Sentencas: The results show that the stability range of sigma-phase is larger than indicated by the presently used thermodynamic data bases.
Titulo: Sigma-phase formation in high chromium ferritic steels at 650 °C
